task.label: Not Forever
task.value: integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] integration_config['Keep Task History'] == "Not Forever"

task.label: Forever
task.value: integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] integration_config['Keep Task History'] != "Not Forever"

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from.

parameter.label: Submission ID
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to retrieve answers for.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being created in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the datastore form the submission is for.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON map of submission field values.

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] duration = integration_config['Task History Duration'].to_i
{ "Task Run Id" => @run['Id'], "Delete After Date Time" => (Time.now + (86400 * duration)).iso8601 }.to_json%>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: UUID
parameter.tooltip: The UUID for the MIR3 Notification

parameter.label: Timestamp
parameter.tooltip: The point after which to return contact attempts and responses from the report

parameters.parameter:
<%= last_activity_time = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Record']['Created At']
if @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values'].has_key? ('Onsolve Last Activity Time') if !@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Last Activity Time'].nil? last_activity_time = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Last Activity Time'] end end
Time.parse(last_activity_time).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") %>

parameter.label: Timezone
parameter.tooltip: Timezone to be used for building display lines that include textual timestamps. Options are CST, EST, PST, UTC, or USER

parameters.parameter:
<%= timezone = "UTC"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["CST","EST","PST","UTC","USER"].include? (std_params['Timezone']) timezone = std_params['Timezone'] end
timezone %>

parameter.label: Responses Used
parameter.tooltip: 0 = Do not included responses in results, 1 = Include responses

parameters.parameter:
<%= responses_used = "1"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["0","1"].include? (std_params['Responses Used']) responses_used = std_params['Responses Used'] end
responses_used %>

parameter.label: Success Responder Type
parameter.tooltip: 0 = Not needed, 1 = First and Last Name, 2 = Employee ID, 3 = User Name, 4 = Primary Key

parameters.parameter:
<%= success_responder = "2"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["0","1","2","3","4"].include? (std_params['Success Responder Type']) success_responder = std_params['Success Responder Type'] end
success_responder %>

parameter.label: Primary Key Field
parameter.tooltip: Required only if using Success Responder Type = 4, otherwise not used

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
primary_key = std_params['Primary Key'] if !std_params['Primary Key'].nil?
primary_key %>

parameter.label: Detail Level
parameter.tooltip: 1 = Contact attemptes, responses, and counts, 2 = Responses and counts, 3 = Only 'Success' responses and counts, 4 = Counts only

parameters.parameter:
<%= detail_level = "1"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
if ["1","2","3","4"].include? (std_params['Detail Level']) detail_level = std_params['Detail Level'] end
detail_level %>

<%= report_name = "Integration Results"
integration_config = JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Integration Configuration'] std_params = JSON.parse(integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters'] || "{}")
report_name = std_params['Report Name'] if !std_params['Report Name'].nil?
report_name %>

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Retrieve By
parameter.tooltip: How to retrieve the submission. Id or Query.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the kapp to query

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form to query

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: A query that will retrieve a single submission

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being retrieved.

parameters.parameter:
<%=
integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] result_action_parameters = JSON.parse( integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters'] ) successResponderType = result_action_parameters['Success Responder Type']
report_output = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) report_result = report_output['execute_custom_report_response']['report_detail'] headers = report_result['header']['column_name'] rows = report_result['row'] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Array) rows = [report_result['row']] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Hash)
display_line_assignee = headers.find_index('ASSIGNEE') display_line_assignee_name = headers.find_index('ASSIGNEENAME') display_line_assignee_response = headers.find_index('ASSIGNEERESPONSE') display_line_responder_primary_key = headers.find_index('RESPONDERPRIMARYKEY') display_line_assignee_response_time = headers.find_index('ASSIGNEERESPONSETIME') display_line_status = headers.find_index('STATUS')
## if zero, we don't want to assign ## if 1, 2, 3, 4 we need to report the value ## output like {"responderType":"0","responderValue":"abcd"} ## we'll use the output in following nodes to determine what to do.
if successResponderType == "4" assignee = rows.first['value'][display_line_responder_primary_key] else assignee = rows.first['value'][display_line_assignee] end notification_status = rows.first['value'][display_line_status] assignee_name = rows.first['value'][display_line_assignee_name] assignee_response = rows.first['value'][display_line_assignee_response] assignee_response_time = rows.first['value'][display_line_assignee_response_time]
output = { "notificationStatus" => notification_status, "responderType" => successResponderType, "responderValue" => assignee, "responderName" => assignee_name, "responderResponse" => assignee_response, "responderResponseTime" => assignee_response_time }.to_json %>

task.label: No Assignment
task.value: integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] integration_config['Assign Responder'] != "Yes" || ( JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['notificationStatus'] != "RESPONDED" || JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['responderType'].nil? || JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['responderType'] == "0" )

task.label: Expects Assignment
task.value: integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] integration_config['Assign Responder'] == "Yes" && ( JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['notificationStatus'] == "RESPONDED" && !JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['responderType'].nil? && JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['responderType'] != "0" )

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] notification_method_options = {"calloutInfo" => "Callout", "broadcastInfo" => "Broadcast", "bulletinBoardInfo" => "Bulletin Board", "firstResponseInfo" => "First Response"} notification_method = notification_method_options[integration_config['Notification Method']] assignment_logic_output = JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] ) report_output = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) report_result = report_output['execute_custom_report_response']['report_detail'] headers = report_result['header']['column_name'] rows = report_result['row'] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Array) rows = [report_result['row']] if report_result['row'].is_a? (Hash)
assignment_status = nil if assignment_logic_output['notificationStatus'] == "RESPONDED" && !['Broadcast','Bulletin Board'].include?(notification_method) if integration_config['Assign Responder'] == "Yes" if @results['Get Cherwell User'] && !JSON.parse( @results['Get Cherwell User']['User JSON'] ).empty? # If successfully assigned if @results.has_key?('Assign Cherwell') && @results['Assign Cherwell']['Handler Error Message'].to_s.empty? # Assignment successful assignment_status = "completed and assigned #{assignment_logic_output['responderName']} as the responder accepting the issue with the response: #{assignment_logic_output['responderResponse']}." else # Assignment unsuccessful assignment_status = "completed and #{assignment_logic_output['responderName']} accepted the issue with the response: #{assignment_logic_output['responderResponse']} - HOWEVER, assignment to that Service Now user was unsuccessful." end else assignment_status = "completed and #{assignment_logic_output['responderName']} accepted the issue with the response: #{assignment_logic_output['responderResponse']} - HOWEVER, assignment to that Service Now user was unsuccessful." end else assignment_status = "completed and #{assignment_logic_output['responderName']} accepted the issue with the response: #{assignment_logic_output['responderResponse']}." end elsif assignment_logic_output['notificationStatus'] == "RESPONDED" assignment_status = "completed." elsif assignment_logic_output['notificationStatus'] == "TERMINATED" assignment_status = "was manually cancelled by an administrator." elsif assignment_logic_output['notificationStatus'] == "TIME_OUT" && !['Broadcast','Bulletin Board'].include?(notification_method) assignment_status = "completed but no responder was identified." elsif assignment_logic_output['notificationStatus'] == "TIME_OUT" assignment_status = "completed." else assignment_status = "completed." end
work_note_text = "#{notification_method} Notification \"#{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['OnSolve Notification Title']}\" (UUID: #{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id']})" work_note_text += " #{assignment_status}" if !assignment_status.nil?
if ["Standard Reporting","Custom Action"].include?( integration_config['Notification Result Action'] ) work_note_text += " Status update through completion:" if (!assignment_status.nil? && assignment_logic_output['notificationStatus'] != "TERMINATED") work_note_text += " Status update through termination:" if (!assignment_status.nil? && assignment_logic_output['notificationStatus'] == "TERMINATED") display_line_index = headers.find_index('DISPLAYLINE'); rows.each{|row| work_note_text += "\n#{row['value'][display_line_index]}" } end
work_note_text %>

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] client_reference = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Reference Id'] uuid = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id']
"Unable to retrieve 'Integration Results' report from MIR3 for UUID: #{uuid} (Integration Name: #{integration_config['Name']}, client reference: #{client_reference})" %>

parameter.label: Error Message Details
parameter.tooltip: The error message details to be sent with the error notification

parameters.parameter: <%= results = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) comments = "" results['error'].each{|key,value| comments << "\n#{key}: #{value}" } comments %>

parameter.label: Integration Id
parameter.tooltip: The Submission Id of the integration configuration record

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The Submission Id of the Task Activity Monitor record

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: The receipient list to receive the notification

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] notification_method_options = {"calloutInfo" => "Callout", "broadcastInfo" => "Broadcast", "bulletinBoardInfo" => "Bulletin Board", "firstResponseInfo" => "First Response"} notification_method = notification_method_options[integration_config['Notification Method']] client_reference = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Reference Id'] uuid = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id']
work_notes = ["#{notification_method} Notification \"#{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['OnSolve Notification Title']}\" (UUID: #{@results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id']}) completed, however Kinetic was unable to retrieve the details. Error Message (if applicable):"]
results = JSON.parse(@results['Get Integration Report Results']['Output']) results['error'].each{|key,value| work_notes.push( "#{key}: #{value}" ) }
work_notes.join("\n") %>

parameters.parameter:
<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration'] parameters = JSON.parse(integration_config['Result Standard Action Parameters']) source_data = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Source Data'] source_id = @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'] source_type_id = integration_config['Schema Type Id'] journal_type_id = parameters['Journal Object Type Id']
{ "Status" => "New", "Source" => "Cherwell", "Source Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'], "Source Reference Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Reference Id'], "UUID" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id'], "Task Activity Monitor Record" => JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Task Activity Monitor Submission'], "Related Activity Record" => @results['Add Submission Activity']['Id'], "Action" => "Create", "Payload" => { "object_name" => parameters['Journal Type'], "object_json" => { "Parent TypeID":source_type_id, "Parent RecID":source_id, "Journal TypeID":journal_type_id, "Details" => @results['Assemble Work Note - Error']['output'], "Show In Self Service": "false" }.to_json }.to_json }.to_json %>

{ "Status" => "New", "Source" => "Cherwell", "Source Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Id'], "Source Reference Id" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Source Reference Id'], "UUID" => @results['Get Task Activity Monitoring Values']['Onsolve Id'], "Task Activity Monitor Record" => JSON.parse(@source['Data'])['Task Activity Monitor Submission'], "Related Activity Record" => @results['Add Submission Activity']['Id'], "Action" => "Create", "Payload" => { "object_name" => parameters['Journal Type'], "object_json" => { "Parent TypeID":source_type_id, "Parent RecID":source_id, "Journal TypeID":journal_type_id, "Details" => @results['Assemble Work Note']['output'], "Show In Self Service": "false" }.to_json }.to_json }.to_json %>

parameters.parameter:
<%= responderType = JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['responderType'] responderValue = JSON.parse( @results['Assignment Logic']['output'] )['responderValue']
#case responderType #when "1" # 1 means First and Last Name from MIR3 user record. # Not sure how this would ever be considered unique # or guaranteed to match what is in Cherwell. # query = responderValue #when "2" # means employeeId from MIR3. # query = responderValue #when "3" # means MIR3 user name. # query = responderValue #when "4" # means the MIR3 UUID of the user. Unsure where # or why this would be stored outside of MIR3. # query = responderValue #end
# Cherwell only supports a login name value for querying about the user, so we'll need to use that in all situations. responderValue %>

<%= integration_config = JSON.parse( @source['Data'] )['Integration Configuration']
integration_config['User Field Containing Match to OnSolve Users Modifier'] || "Internal" %>

parameter.tooltip: Public ID of the object to be updated

parameter.tooltip: A JSON representation of the displayName/values for the fields that should be updated

<%=
{
  "Owned By ID" => JSON.parse( @results['Get Cherwell User']['User JSON'] )['fields']['RecID']
}.to_json
%>
